title: John Muir National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Error: You have supplied an invalid NPMap ID. Please edit this element's data and check to ensure the id is correct.     Welcome To The Maps Page The John Muir National Historic Site is comprised of both the main home property and the Mount Wanda property that is located across highway 4. To view map details of the John Muir NHS, you may use the interactive map on this page. You may also use any online map search to find visual directions to our site. A map of the Mount Wanda area can be downloaded at the link, below.Our site address is: John Muir National Historic Site  4202 Alhambra Ave Martinez, CA 94553 925-228-8860 Mt. Wanda Map (Click to Download jpg.)            Kiosk image of Mount Wanda, found at trail head. You may download the image by clicking the provided link.
